sentences: Rita (理多, born March 25), real name Riko Hirai (平井 理子), is a Japanese singer, lyricist, and voice actress from Osaka.
The majority of her work is dealt with adult visual novels.
She was also the singer for all the vocal music in Key's visual novel Little Busters!, as well as Liar-soft's "Steampunk" series.
Kindred Spirits on the Roof as Koba Youka
A Drug That Makes You Dream as Misaki
